department.ch: 化學工程與材料工程學系

remark.ch: 研究所領域分類:材料類

goal.en: The aim of this course is to gain an understanding of the role of phase transformations on the development of microstructure and properties of metallic, ceramic and polymeric materials. The course will highlight a number of commercially-significant applications where phase transformations are important.
goal.ch: 本課程的目的是瞭解相變化對金屬、陶瓷和高分子材料的微觀結構和性能發展的作用。本課程將重點介紹一些具有商業應用非常重要的相變化行為。

content.en:
Nucleation in the liquid and solid states; thermodynamics of phase transformations; phase equilibrium diagrams, solidification of pure metals and alloys; thermal supercooling; constitutional supercooling; interfacial structure and interface stability; solute redistribution; glass formation; crystal growth techniques.
Solid-state transformations: nucleation and growth of phases; diffusion mechanisms; transformation
kinetics; CCT transformation diagrams. Diffusional and diffusionless transformations: decomposition of solid solutions; order/disorder transformations, spinodal decomposition; eutectoid, bainitic and martensitic transformations. Applications of phase transformations in functional materials.
content.ch:
液體和固態的成核; 相變的熱力學; 相平衡圖; 純金屬和合金的凝固學; 熱過冷; 組成過冷; 介面結構和穩定性; 溶質再分配; 玻璃形成; 晶體生長技術。
固態/固態相變化：固態相成核與生長;擴散機制;轉化動力學; CCT圖。擴散和非擴散相變化：固溶體分解; ；規律/無規律變態，離相分解; 共析分解、 變韌鐵和麻田散體變態轉換。鐵相變化。相變在功能材料中的應用。
